Message.Title: At this points all dips are different to shorts and longs.

Topic.Title: Conviction Shorts

Message.Msg: Like I said, if you had some profits you had to take them but unless I was long here I don't understand rooting for this company. They don't make money and they have helped push other companies out of business while not even playing on a level playing field since they had an unfair tax advantage. How exactly is that good for mom and pop and even your average brick and mortar store and those employed there? Additionally, insiders are getting richer and richer off what amounts to a trading scheme. You will never see insiders buying but you'll see them selling for millions in droves. This is somehow good for you? This is a company you want to root for? Exactly why might that be?
